languages.text: "Осколки были обретены — один за другим. Первый, Вог, был найден на просторах региона Безбожных Звезд. Второй, Хайг — был извлечен из тела планетоида, где слуги трупа на троне обнаружили его, копошась в грязи, и поддались шепотам. Вог был доверен бывшему претенденту, а Хайг забрала наша слуга по имени Заря... Но вмешал{mf|ся|ась} ты — разрезав нити гобелена, ты прервал{mf||а} миссию претендента и уничтожил{mf||а} пророчицу. Когда-то клинок должен был быть скован... но узор изменился — теперь ты станешь сосудом могущества Предела".

"The shards were reclaimed, one after another. The first, Vog, was found in the vastness of the Heathen Stars. The second, Haik, was extracted from the body of a planetoid, where the corpse emperor's lackeys, crawling in the dirt, unearthed it and heeded the whispers. Vog was entrusted to our last aspirant, and the servant named Aurora accepted Haik... but you intervened. You cut the threads of the tapestry by interrupting the aspirant's mission and destroying the prophet. The sword was once destined to be reforged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."
languages.original_text: "Осколки были обретены — один за другим. Первый, Вог, был найден на просторах региона Безбожных Звезд. Второй, Хайг — был извлечен из тела планетоида, где слуги трупа на троне обнаружили его, копошась в грязи, и поддались шепотам. Вог был доверен бывшему претенденту, а Хайг забрала наша слуга по имени Заря... Но вмешал{mf|ся|ась} ты — разрезав нити гобелена, ты прервал{mf||а} миссию претендента и уничтожил{mf||а} пророчицу. Когда-то клинок должен был быть скован... но узор изменился — теперь ты станешь сосудом могущества Предела".

traits.locale_text: "Shards were obtained one after another, but then you intervened. By cutting the threads of the tapestry you stopped the challenger's mission and took their place. The sword had to be forged at some point... but the pattern has changed and now you will become the vessel for the power of the Edge."

"Shards were obtained one after another, but then you intervened. By cutting the threads of the tapestry you stopped the challenger's mission and took their place. The sword had to be forged at some point... but the pattern has changed and now you will become the vessel for the power of the Edge."

"The shards were reclaimed, one after another. The first, Vog, was found in the vastness of the Heathen Stars. The second, Haik, was extracted from the body of a planetoid, where the corpse emperor's lackeys, crawling in the dirt, unearthed it and heeded the whispers. Vog was entrusted to our last aspirant, and the servant named Aurora accepted Haik... but you intervened. You cut the threads of the tapestry by interrupting the aspirant's mission and destroying the prophet. The sword was once destined to be reforged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."

"The shards have been found, one after another. But you had to intervene. By cutting the threads of the tapestry, you interrupted the challenger's mission and took their place. At some point, the sword must be forged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."

"The shards were reclaimed, one after another. The first, Vog, was found in the vastness of the Heathen Stars. The second, Haik, was extracted from the body of a planetoid, where the corpse emperor's lackeys, crawling in the dirt, unearthed it and heeded the whispers. The sword was once destined to be reforged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."

"The shards were reclaimed, one after another. The first, Vog, was found in the vastness of the Heathen Stars. The second, Haik, was extracted from the body of a planetoid, where the corpse emperor's lackeys, crawling in the dirt, unearthed it and heeded the whispers. Vog was entrusted to our last aspirant, and the servant named Aurora accepted Haik... but you intervened. You cut the threads of the tapestry by interrupting the aspirant's mission and destroying the prophet. The sword was once destined to be reforged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."

languages.text: “那些碎片被一块接一块地找了回来。第一块碎片，沃格，是在浩瀚的异端群星中发现的。第二块碎片，希杰，是在某颗小行星中挖出来的。尸皇的仆人们在泥土中不断翻找，最后终于将它挖了出来，聆听它的低语行事。沃格被托付给了我们最新的候选者，而希杰则交给了那位名叫‘极光’的仆人……但你却介入了预定好的命运。你剪断了绣帷的丝线，干扰了候选者的任务，还杀死了先知。那把利刃必将被再次锻造……然而，预定好的剧情已经彻底改变。如今，你将会成为破晓锋刃力量的容器。”
languages.original_text: "The shards were reclaimed, one after another. The first, Vog, was found in the vastness of the Heathen Stars. The second, Haik, was extracted from the body of a planetoid, where the corpse emperor's lackeys, crawling in the dirt, unearthed it and heeded the whispers. Vog was entrusted to our last aspirant, and the servant named Aurora accepted Haik... but you intervened. You cut the threads of the tapestry by interrupting the aspirant's mission and destroying the prophet. The sword was once destined to be reforged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."

traits.locale_text: “那些碎片被一块接一块地找了回来。第一块碎片，沃格，是在浩瀚的异端群星中发现的。第二块碎片，希杰，是在某颗小行星中挖出来的。尸皇的仆人们在泥土中不断翻找，最后终于将它挖了出来，聆听它的低语行事。沃格被托付给了我们最新的候选者，而希杰则交给了那位名叫‘极光’的仆人……但你却介入了预定好的命运。你剪断了绣帷的丝线，干扰了候选者的任务，还杀死了先知。那把利刃必将被再次锻造……然而，预定好的剧情已经彻底改变。如今，你将会成为破晓锋刃力量的容器。”

languages.text: « Les fragments ont été récupérés, l'un après l'autre. Le premier, Vog, a été retrouvé dans les vastes étendues des Étoiles Athées. Le deuxième, Haik, a été extrait des entrailles d'un planétoïde moribond où les sbires de l'Empereur-Cadavre ont pataugé dans la boue pour l'exhumer sur ordre des murmures. Vog a été confié à notre dernier aspirant, et Haik à la dénommée Aurore... mais il a fallu que vous interveniez. En interrompant la mission de l'aspirant et en éliminant le prophète, vous avez coupé les fils de la tapisserie. L'épée était autrefois destinée à être reforgée... mais son motif a changé et vous allez maintenant devenir le réceptacle de la puissance de la Lame. »
languages.original_text: "The shards were reclaimed, one after another. The first, Vog, was found in the vastness of the Heathen Stars. The second, Haik, was extracted from the body of a planetoid, where the corpse emperor's lackeys, crawling in the dirt, unearthed it and heeded the whispers. Vog was entrusted to our last aspirant, and the servant named Aurora accepted Haik... but you intervened. You cut the threads of the tapestry by interrupting the aspirant's mission and destroying the prophet. The sword was once destined to be reforged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."

traits.locale_text: « Les fragments ont été récupérés, l'un après l'autre. Le premier, Vog, a été retrouvé dans les vastes étendues des Étoiles Athées. Le deuxième, Haik, a été extrait des entrailles d'un planétoïde moribond où les sbires de l'Empereur-Cadavre ont pataugé dans la boue pour l'exhumer sur ordre des murmures. Vog a été confié à notre dernier aspirant, et Haik à la dénommée Aurore... mais il a fallu que vous interveniez. En interrompant la mission de l'aspirant et en éliminant le prophète, vous avez coupé les fils de la tapisserie. L'épée était autrefois destinée à être reforgée... mais son motif a changé et vous allez maintenant devenir le réceptacle de la puissance de la Lame. »

languages.text: 「欠片は次々と回収された。1つ目のヴォッグは、広大な異教に歌われし星々で発見された。2つ目のハイクは、小惑星の中から発掘された。それは死体の皇帝のしもべが土を這うようにして掘り起こし、その囁きに耳を傾けていたものだ。ヴォッグは最後の志願者に託され、オーロラという名のしもべがハイクを手に入れた…だが、お前が介入してきた。お前は志願者の使命を妨げ、予言を破壊することでタペストリーの糸を切断したのだ。かつて剣は、再鍛の運命にあった…だが鋳型は変わった。今や、お前が刃の力の器となるのだ」
languages.original_text: "The shards were reclaimed, one after another. The first, Vog, was found in the vastness of the Heathen Stars. The second, Haik, was extracted from the body of a planetoid, where the corpse emperor's lackeys, crawling in the dirt, unearthed it and heeded the whispers. Vog was entrusted to our last aspirant, and the servant named Aurora accepted Haik... but you intervened. You cut the threads of the tapestry by interrupting the aspirant's mission and destroying the prophet. The sword was once destined to be reforged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."

traits.locale_text: 「欠片は次々と回収された。1つ目のヴォッグは、広大な異教に歌われし星々で発見された。2つ目のハイクは、小惑星の中から発掘された。それは死体の皇帝のしもべが土を這うようにして掘り起こし、その囁きに耳を傾けていたものだ。ヴォッグは最後の志願者に託され、オーロラという名のしもべがハイクを手に入れた…だが、お前が介入してきた。お前は志願者の使命を妨げ、予言を破壊することでタペストリーの糸を切断したのだ。かつて剣は、再鍛の運命にあった…だが鋳型は変わった。今や、お前が刃の力の器となるのだ」

languages.text: «Los fragmentos fueron recuperados, uno tras otro. El primero, Vog, fue localizado en la inmensidad de las Estrellas Paganas. El segundo fue extraído del interior de un planetoide por los lacayos del emperador cadáver, que, arrastrándose por el suelo, acataron los susurros. Se confió Vog a nuestro último aspirante, mientras que Aurora aceptó a Haik... hasta que interviniste. Cortaste los hilos del tapiz cuando interrumpiste la misión del aspirante y destruiste a mi profeta. El destino de la espada era ser reforjada... pero el patrón ha cambiado y ahora serás tú el receptáculo del poder del Filo».
languages.original_text: "The shards were reclaimed, one after another. The first, Vog, was found in the vastness of the Heathen Stars. The second, Haik, was extracted from the body of a planetoid, where the corpse emperor's lackeys, crawling in the dirt, unearthed it and heeded the whispers. Vog was entrusted to our last aspirant, and the servant named Aurora accepted Haik... but you intervened. You cut the threads of the tapestry by interrupting the aspirant's mission and destroying the prophet. The sword was once destined to be reforged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."

traits.locale_text: «Los fragmentos fueron recuperados, uno tras otro. El primero, Vog, fue localizado en la inmensidad de las Estrellas Paganas. El segundo fue extraído del interior de un planetoide por los lacayos del emperador cadáver, que, arrastrándose por el suelo, acataron los susurros. Se confió Vog a nuestro último aspirante, mientras que Aurora aceptó a Haik... hasta que interviniste. Cortaste los hilos del tapiz cuando interrumpiste la misión del aspirante y destruiste a mi profeta. El destino de la espada era ser reforjada... pero el patrón ha cambiado y ahora serás tú el receptáculo del poder del Filo».

languages.text: "Die Splitter wurden geborgen, einer nach dem anderen. Der erste, Vog, wurde in den Weiten der Sterne der Ungläubigen gefunden. Der zweite, Haik, wurde dem Körper eines Planetoiden entnommen, auf dem die Lakaien des Leichenimperators im Dreck wühlten, den Splitter bargen und das Flüstern beherzigten. Vog wurde unserem letzten Aspiranten anvertraut, und die Dienerin namens Aurora akzeptierte Haik ... aber Ihr habt interveniert. Ihr habt die Fäden des Wandteppichs durchtrennt, indem Ihr die Mission des Aspiranten gestört und den Propheten zerstört habt. Das Schwert war einst dazu bestimmt, neu geschmiedet zu werden ... doch das Muster hat sich verändert, und nun werdet Ihr zum Gefäß der Macht des Rands werden."
languages.original_text: "The shards were reclaimed, one after another. The first, Vog, was found in the vastness of the Heathen Stars. The second, Haik, was extracted from the body of a planetoid, where the corpse emperor's lackeys, crawling in the dirt, unearthed it and heeded the whispers. Vog was entrusted to our last aspirant, and the servant named Aurora accepted Haik... but you intervened. You cut the threads of the tapestry by interrupting the aspirant's mission and destroying the prophet. The sword was once destined to be reforged... but the pattern has changed, and now you will become the vessel for the Edge's power."

traits.locale_text: "Die Splitter wurden gefunden, einer nach dem anderen. Doch Ihr musstet intervenieren. Indem Ihr die Fäden des Wandteppichs durchtrennt habt, habt Ihr die Mission des Herausforderers unterbrochen und seinen Platz eingenommen. Irgendwann muss das Schwert wieder zusammengeschmiedet werden ... doch das Muster hat sich verändert, und nun werdet Ihr zum Gefäß der Macht des Rands werden."
